score = score * 100.0
print(' >#%d: %.3f' % (r+1, score))
scores.append(score)
# summarize results
summarize_results(scores)
# run the experiment
run_experiment()
Listing 25.20: Example of evaluating a ConvLSTM model for activity recognition.
As with the prior experiments, running the model prints the performance of the model each
time it is ﬁt and evaluated. A summary of the ﬁnal model performance is presented at the end
